verses.verse: And the <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of them <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G71>led<s%> him to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And they <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> fellow <S%G1294>perverting<s%> the <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G2967>forbidding<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5411>tribute<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that he <S%G1438>himself<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G935>King.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1488>Are<s%> you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> And he <S%G611>answered<s%> him and <S%G5346>said,<s%> You say <S%G3004><s%> it.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and to the <S%G3793>people,<s%> I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>fault<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>

And they were the <S%G2001>more<s%> <S%G2001>fierce,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He <S%G383>stirs<s%> up the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2596>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2449>Jewry,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> to <S%G5602>this<s%> <S%G5602>place.<s%>
When <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> were a <S%G1057>Galilaean.<s%>

And as soon as he <S%G1921>knew<s%> that he <S%G1510>belonged<s%> to <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> <S%G1849>jurisdiction,<s%> he <S%G375>sent<s%> him to <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> who <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> that <S%G2250>time.<s%>

And when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he was <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5463>glad:<s%> for he was <S%G2309>desirous<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> him of a <S%G2425>long<s%> season, <S%G1223>because<s%> he had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things of him; and he <S%G1679>hoped<s%> to have <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> by him.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G1905>questioned<s%> with him in <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3056>words;<s%> but he <S%G611>answered<s%> him <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>
And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G2159>vehemently<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> him.

And <S%G2264>Herod<s%> with his <S%G4753>men<s%> of <S%G4753>war<s%> <S%G1848>set<s%> him <S%G1848>at<s%> <S%G1848>nothing,<s%> and <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, and <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> him in a <S%G2986>gorgeous<s%> <S%G2066>robe,<s%> and <S%G375>sent<s%> him <S%G375>again<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> and <S%G2264>Herod<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G3326>together:<s%> <S%G240><s%> for <S%G4391>before<s%> they were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G4314>between<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> when he had <S%G4779>called<s%> <S%G4779>together<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G758>rulers<s%> and the <S%G2992>people,<s%>

<S%G2036>Said<s%> to them, You have <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to me, as one that <S%G654>perverts<s%> the <S%G2992>people:<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I, having <S%G350>examined<s%> him <S%G1799>before<s%> you, have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>fault<s%> in <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> touching those things whereof you <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him:

<S%G235>No,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> yet <S%G2264>Herod:<s%> for I <S%G375>sent<s%> you to him; and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> is <S%G4238>done<s%> to him.
I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>chastise<s%> him, and <S%G630>release<s%> him.
(For of <S%G2192>necessity<s%> <S%G318><s%> he must <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> to them <S%G2596>at<s%> the <S%G1859>feast.<s%>)
And they <S%G349>cried<s%> out <S%G3829>all<s%> <S%G3826>at<s%> <S%G3826>once,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Away with <S%G5126>this<s%> man, and <S%G630>release<s%> to us <S%G912>Barabbas:<s%>

<S%G3748>(Who<s%> for a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4714>sedition<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and for <S%G5408>murder,<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison.<s%>)
<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4377>spoke<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to them.
But they <S%G2019>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> him, <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them the <S%G5154>third<s%> time, <S%G1063>Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> has he <S%G4160>done?<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in him: I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>chastise<s%> him, and let him <S%G630>go.<s%>

And they were <S%G1945>instant<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G154>requiring<s%> that he might be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> And the <S%G5456>voices<s%> of them and of the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2729>prevailed.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> gave <S%G1948>sentence<s%> that it should be as they <S%G155>required.<s%>

And he <S%G630>released<s%> to them him that for <S%G4714>sedition<s%> and <S%G5408>murder<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they had <S%G154>desired;<s%> but he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to their <S%G2307>will.<s%>

And as they <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away,<s%> they laid <S%G1949>hold<s%> on <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> a <S%G2956>Cyrenian,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> out of the <S%G68>country,<s%> and <S%G2007>on<s%> him they <S%G2007>laid<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> that he might <S%G5342>bear<s%> it <S%G3693>after<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And there <S%G190>followed<s%> him a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>company<s%> of <S%G2992>people,<s%> and of <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2875>bewailed<s%> and <S%G2354>lamented<s%> him.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turning<s%> to them <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2364>Daughters<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> not for me, but <S%G2799>weep<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and for <S%G5216>your<s%> children. <S%G5043><s%>

For, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G2064>coming,<s%> in the <S%G3739>which<s%> they shall <S%G2046>say,<s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the <S%G4723>barren,<s%> and the <S%G2836>wombs<s%> that <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G1080>bore,<s%> and the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> gave suck. <S%G2337><s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall they <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G4098>Fall<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> us; and to the <S%G1015>hills,<s%> <S%G2572>Cover<s%> us.
For <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things in a <S%G5200>green<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> in the dry? <S%G3584><s%>
And there were <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2087>other,<s%> <S%G2557>malefactors,<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> with him to be <S%G337>put<s%> to <S%G337>death.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G565>come<s%> to the <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2898>Calvary,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him, and the <S%G2557>malefactors,<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and the <S%G3739>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G710>left.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> them; for they <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> they do. <S%G4160><s%> And they <S%G1266>parted<s%> his <S%G2440>raiment,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots.<s%>

And the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2334>beholding.<s%> And the <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with them <S%G1592>derided<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> let him <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he be <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G1588>chosen<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, <S%G4334>coming<s%> to him, and <S%G4374>offering<s%> him <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%>
And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G935>king<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>

And a <S%G1923>superscription<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> him in <S%G1121>letters<s%> of <S%G1673>Greek,<s%> and <S%G4513>Latin,<s%> and <S%G1444>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G3778>THIS<s%> IS THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2557>malefactors<s%> which were <S%G2910>hanged<s%> <S%G987>railed<s%> on him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you be <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> and us.

But the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Do not you <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>seeing<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation?<s%>

And we <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1346>justly;<s%> for we <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G514>due<s%> <S%G514>reward<s%> of our <S%G3739>deeds:<s%> <S%G4238><s%> but <S%G3778>this<s%> man has <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G824>amiss.<s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> me <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> your <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, To <S%G4594>day<s%> shall you be with me in paradise. <S%G3857><s%>

And it was <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and there was a <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>
And the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> and the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>rent<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5455>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> your <S%G5495>hands<s%> I <S%G3908>commend<s%> my spirit: <S%G4151><s%> and having <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3778>thus,<s%> he gave up the <S%G1606>ghost.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G1096>done,<s%> he <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3689>Certainly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> was a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> that <S%G4836>came<s%> <S%G4836>together<s%> to that <S%G2335>sight,<s%> <S%G2334>beholding<s%> the things which were <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G5180>smote<s%> their <S%G4738>breasts,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1110>acquaintance,<s%> and the <S%G1135>women<s%> that <S%G4870>followed<s%> him from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> off, <S%G3708>beholding<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things.
And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> a <S%G1010>counselor;<s%> and he was a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and a <S%G1342>just:<s%>

(The <S%G3778>same<s%> had not <S%G4784>consented<s%> to the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> and <S%G4234>deed<s%> of them;) he was of <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4327>waited<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G4334>went<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> and <S%G154>begged<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And he <S%G2507>took<s%> it <S%G2507>down,<s%> and <S%G1794>wrapped<s%> it in <S%G4616>linen,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> it in a <S%G3418>sepulcher<s%> that was <S%G2991>hewn<s%> in <S%G2991>stone,<s%> <S%G3757>wherein<s%> <S%G3764>never<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3764>before<s%> was <S%G2749>laid.<s%>
And that <S%G2250>day<s%> was the <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> and the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2020>drew<s%> <S%G2020>on.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4905>came<s%> with him from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2628>followed<s%> <S%G2628>after,<s%> and <S%G2300>beheld<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and <S%G5613>how<s%> his <S%G4983>body<s%> was <S%G5087>laid.<s%>

And they <S%G5290>returned,<s%> and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G759>spices<s%> and <S%G3464>ointments;<s%> and <S%G2270>rested<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>
